learning_objective: Design projects that combine hardware and software components to collect and exchange data.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is a musician who composes their own music. They often find themselves humming out melodies on the go and they need a way to instantly record their ideas. They want to create a system that can turn their hummed melodies into written musical score sheets. What components might Alex need for this design project?",
    "Answer1": "A microphone and a word processor",
    "Answer2": "An audio-to-MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) software and a music notation software",
    "Answer3": "A musical keyboard and a spreadsheet software",
    "Answer4": "A video camera and a social media platform",
    "CorrectAnswer": "2",
    "Explanation": "Alex will likely need an audio-to-MIDI (Musical Instrument Digital Interface) software which recognizes and converts their hummed melodies into MIDI files. They would then need a music notation software to convert these MIDI files into musical scores. Using a microphone to record the hums and combining it with the appropriate software fulfills the requirement of combining hardware and software to collect and exchange data."
}
